bibl.title: Hadrian in Jerusalem and Alexandria in 117.
bibl.note: 1. The Announcement of Hadrian's Accession in Alexandria. - 2. A stasis between Alexandrians and Jews quelled by Hadrian. - 3. Hadrian in Alexandria in September-October 117. - 4. Hadrian in Jerusalem in August or September 117. - 5. Conclusion.
bibl.seg: CAPPONI Livia, Hadrian in Jerusalem and Alexandria in 117.

1. The Announcement of Hadrian's Accession in Alexandria. - 2. A stasis between Alexandrians and Jews quelled by Hadrian. - 3. Hadrian in Alexandria in September-October 117. - 4. Hadrian in Jerusalem in August or September 117. - 5. Conclusion.
